H0.text: Which NATO member country has the smallest population. Albania

H1.text: Which NATO member country has the smallest population. Slovenia

H2.text: Which NATO member country has the smallest population. Luxembourg

H3.text: Which NATO member country has the smallest population. Hyui

A4.text: In 2025, it had a population of 681,973, which makes it one of the least-populated countries in Europe, albeit with the highest population growth rate; foreign nationals account for almost half the population.
